title: Sakvithi guilty of bigamy
content: Alleged financial scammer Chandana Weerakumara alias Sakvithi Ranasinghe was sentenced to two years Rigorous Imprisonment together with a fine of 25,000 Rupees today, for solemnizing a second marriage while the first marriage existed. Ranasinghe married N. Subashini De Silva in March 1998, and while the marriage existed, on or about March 2006, he was found…
